text:
Appendix A
Getting Help
This is just the beginning of your journey with deep learning for time series forecasting with
Python. As you start to work on methods or expand your existing knowledge of algorithms you
may need help. This chapter points out some of the best sources of help.
A.1 Applied Time Series
There are a wealth of good books on applied time series suitable for the machine learning
perspective. Most are focused on time series using the R platform. Nevertheless, even though
